      Methods in Solver that return Solution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Solution Genetic.beginSelfEvolution()
      population initialization fitness computation while (termination condition) parent selection crossover with probability pC mutation with probability pM Infeasible Individuals FIX Dynamic Local Search (Simulated Annealing / Tabu Search) natural selection update best solution return best
      private Solution Genetic.crossover(Solution parent1, Solution parent2)
      implements uniform crossover for each exam to assign into the new spring flip coin if(gene of parent1 is feasible and gene of parent2 is feasible) then if head take gene from parent1 else take gene from parent2 else take the feasible gene
      private Solution SimulatedAnnealing.generateNeighborByExamAndSlotWeight(Solution sol)
      This method generate a neighbor from a solution It selects the timeslot with the highest rank It selects the exam in that timeslot with the highest conflict rank Move that exam in the first timeslot where it has no conflict
      private Solution SimulatedAnnealing.generateNeighborByExamListSwap(Solution sol, int n)
      This method generate a neighbor from a solution It selects random two timeslots.
      private Solution SimulatedAnnealing.generateNeighborByExamMove(Solution sol)
      This method generate a neighbor from a solution It selects random two timeslots.
      private Solution SimulatedAnnealing.generateNeighborByExamWeight(Solution sol, java.util.Map<ETP.Exam,java.lang.Double> exam_weight)
      This method generate a neighbor from a solution It selects randomly two timeslots It select the first exam in the first timeslot with the higher cost, that no have conflict in the second timeslot Move that exam from the first timeslot to the second one It does the viceversa
      private Solution SimulatedAnnealing.getBestSolution()
      This method return the best solution found by the algorithm
